description: The production of video and photography crosses all aspects of Destination Canada’s business units, channels and markets. We are visual storytellers who are constantly in production mode with multiple production projects on the go at any time. In order to achieve our business goals and tell stories that effectively communicate our messages to our target audiences; we are looking for a wide range of collaborators who can lead projects and/or contribute deliverables as part of a project led by DC or a DC third-party agency.

# Government Tender Announcement
## Video and Photo Production Services Request for Standing Offer

### Solicitation Number: DC-2023-CD-08
### Closing Date: November 6, 2023, at 17:00:00

Destination Canada is seeking a reliable supplier for Video and Photo Production Services. This Request for Standing Offer is for a term of four years, with the option to extend for an additional three years.

### Scope of Work

The successful bidder will be required to produce high-quality video and photo content for various business units, channels, and markets. The scope of work includes:

* General Production Support: Producers and/or lean production teams/companies with the ability to scale.
* Production Services: Video production, post-production, photography, video/photo editing, motion graphics, and post-production.

### Criteria for Evaluation

Bidders will be evaluated on their technical merit and price. The highest combined rating will be awarded the Standing Offer.

### Important Dates

* Publication Date: October 6, 2023
* Amendment Date: November 6, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 29, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: February 28, 2028

### Contracting Entity

Destination Canada, a Crown Corporation, is seeking a qualified supplier for these services.

### Contact Information

* Christine Duguay, Procurement Officer
* Email: procurement@destinationcanada.com
* Phone: (604) 638-8345

### Documents

The tender documents are available on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/.) portal. Please note that all bidders must read and agree to the terms and conditions outlined in the tender package.

### Classification

This Request for Standing Offer is classified as a [Trade Agreement](#trade-agreement).
